Replace.Text: You are the most supreme, Austrian Emperor! The Austrian Empire is not just a country, but an expression of the idea of ​​a divine universal empire; an empire entrusted with the mission of ruling all the peoples of the world. Although our authority is constantly challenged from within and outside the empire, under your leadership, our empire remains unshakable, because it is Austria's destiny to rule the world.
The country is prosperous and the people are healthy. We all pay tribute to our emperor; [NEWLINE] Our emperor also hopes that all people are one country and the brotherhood is the most noble.

Prince Eugen, noble knight! You have recaptured the city and fortress of Belgrade for the emperor, allowing people to travel freely and defeating all invaders. Under your leadership, the Holy Roman Empire will be invincible. In the rear of the motherland, the people pray devoutly for your victory, and poets and musicians will compose new music for you.
God's chosen people love him, and those who do injustice fear him.
Austria was destined to rule the world

All governments gain an additional wildcard slot. +50% [ICON_PRODUCTION] production when building districts and wonders, and each city can build an additional district regardless of population limit. Each wonder provides +4 [ICON_CULTURE] culture and +1 [ICON_AMENITIES] amenity to all cities, and provides large adjacency bonuses to adjacent districts.

All cities gain -4 Loyalty but +20% [ICON_CULTURE] Culture per turn. Domestic Trade Routes gain +2 [ICON_FOOD] Food, +2 [ICON_FAITH] Faith, and +4 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture, and +2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold, +2 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production, and +4 [ICON_SCIENCE] Science for each (Skoda) Industrial District building in the destination city.
Marshal of the Holy Roman Empire

All governments gain an additional Military policy slot. +10 [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength and +1 [ICON_MOVEMENT] Movement to all units, and no movement loss when crossing rivers. +20% [ICON_FAITH] Faith and +10% [ICON_CULTURE] Culture when at war with the leading civilization.

Austrian unique district that replaces the Industrial District. Receives standard adjacency bonuses from adjacent districts, providing +4 [ICON_GOLD] gold and +2 [ICON_PRODUCTION] production to adjacent Commercial Center, Military Encampment and Port districts. Receives a random [ICON_TECHBOOSTED] Eureka upon completion, and adds one [ICON_TradeRoute] trade route capacity. Buildings in this district gain +2 [ICON_PRODUCTION] production and +4 [ICON_SCIENCE] science.

Austrian unique building that replaces the Workshop. Gain +4 [ICON_GOLD] gold for each Commercial Center building in the city, and +4 [ICON_SCIENCE] science for each Academy building. +20% [ICON_PRODUCTION] production when producing Heavy Cavalry.

Austrian unique building that replaces the University. Upon completion, it grants a random [ICON_CIVICBOOSTED] boost. After entering the player's Industrial Age, building the first Art Academy will grant the Great Man "Adolf".

Austrian modern unique reconnaissance unit, replacing the Special Forces. +15 [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength when in hilly terrain, +10 [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength for each adjacent mountain or hill tile. Restores 20 health after killing an enemy.
Austrian Atomic Era unique naval ranged unit, replacing the missile cruiser. Has longer range and vision. Can attack twice per turn.

Austria's unique Atomic Era heavy cavalry unit, replacing the Modern Tank. Has [ICON_ANTIAIR_LARGE] air defense. +25 [ICON_STRENGTH] combat strength when on non-hilly terrain, -1 [ICON_MOVEMENT] movement when starting a turn on hilly terrain.
+{Property} from each adjacent Hill or Mountain tile
+{1_Amount} If you fail the exam, you can take the exam again
All your units gain +10 [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength, and +2 [ICON_MOVEMENT] Movement.
Prefers civilizations with higher culture values, and dislikes civilizations with lower culture values.
Likes civilizations that get along well with city-states, and dislikes civilizations that wage war against them.
I will continue to work hard to live up to your expectations of me! I also wore the headband you gave me today. Although it fell off several times before, I tried my best to find it back.
Eh? This is too sudden... Can you let me think about it for a while?
What do you want to play tonight? I have prepared 100 ghost stories.
This way your evaluation of me will go up again!
Wow...it seems I need to improve my reputation in your eyes.
Comrades! Whether you love the Empire or hate it, we must defend it at all costs. If not for the Empire... then for us! Stand your ground! Do not shrink! Long live the Emperor!

The mobilization trumpets are blown loudly, and the military flags on the front line are raised solemnly; the arsenal production is being started in an orderly manner, and the battle is taking place both inside and outside the empire!
...I can't let everyone see me in such an embarrassing state. No...I can't accept such a failure!
No, you don’t understand… The empire may be a prison for the nation, but beasts should be kept in cages!
Please leave it to me! I will invite them to the ball at Schönbrunn Palace.
I'm sorry that your delegation came at such a bad time. Next time, next time I will personally treat them to a cup of Viennese coffee.

Good morning, you've worked hard today! What I brought this time is not a negotiation document, but a special low-calorie snack gift package. I hope you can enjoy it in your daily life... Hey, where is my gift package? !
What did you say?! What do you mean 2000 a night?!
Is this the behavior of a decent person? Stop it now! [NEWLINE] (Condemn you)

Hello! Standing before you is... (seeing a small note) the Emperor and King of the Kingdom and the Crown of St. Stephen of Hungary represented by the Imperial Diet - OK, I've finally finished reading it all in one breath! For the sake of convenience, I'll just call it the Austro-Hungarian Empire.
Welcome to Austria! If you are not in a hurry to leave, can you sit for a while?
Ah...thanks for your enthusiasm! Now our map is more complete.

Do you want to come to my capital and have a cup of Viennese coffee? After that, we can go to the Art Academy. By the way, it seems that there is a strange art student who failed the entrance exam there recently.
If you need anything, please rely on me.
I’m so glad to see that you like art and culture as much as I do. Would you like to go see a new opera together sometime?
(The other party prefers civilizations with higher cultural values)
Material incentives are important, but we must not forget people's need for spiritual culture. Your social culture is degenerating. If this continues, how can we shape noble morality?
(The other party does not like civilizations with low cultural values)

I... have been looking forward to this day. I work hard to be trusted and relied upon by you. This desire has always been the reason why I exist here. Now, please let me be your most reliable strength, right?
Let others fight, Austria should get married!
Are you satisfied with this result?
Of course, no problem. I trust you completely.
Sorry, our country's strategic location is too important to be released easily.
Um... I need to pass through your territory, I hope you can give...
What do you want to do? The Anschluss of Germany and Austria is absolutely impossible!
I brought the contract document over here... Hey, where did I put it?
The Austrian Empire is not a country that can be easily dealt with.
IWS2000 satisfies your high cultural output
IWS2000 is not happy with your low cultural output
This is the best Valentine's Day chocolate for you - Prince Eugen. Hehe, you look confused, this is a good reaction. I know exactly what you are imagining and what you are expecting. Hehehe♡
Hmm? I'm just about to catch Wales and go to the coffee shop I saw last time. I'll talk about this next time.
Ich liebe dich (I love you) - Is it true or a joke? You can decide for yourself.
Do you want me to change my name? Then, "Meine Herrin♡"——how about this? Hehehe♪
Oh, I'm practicing my smile... Someone said that my smile looks unnatural. Do you think so too?
Humph, you are really brave. Soldiers of the enemy country, are you ready to die? Even if you escape back to your country, your king will not spare your life!
History has taught us: the Habsburgs are invincible! So, fight for our people! Fight for our Emperor and the Holy Roman Empire! Feuer (Fire)!
Although Wales always behaves frivolously, he is actually very reliable and always helps me in the enemy camp... Unfortunately, it seems that no one can help me this time.
Hehehe...you guys are great...I haven't felt this way for a long time.
This feeling...is not a bad one.
Wow, after a day of playing with Wales, my skin is tanned... Can your delegation please visit at another time?
When eating chocolate made with love, it seems that you can taste the love of the maker. So is my love sweet, mellow, or slightly bitter? Hehe, you can taste it carefully again, okay?
Hmm...? Next time you get your hand broken by Bismarck like the Prince of Wales, I won't beg for mercy.
Can you please get out of my sight? It's a bit of an eyesore... [NEWLINE] (Condemn you)

Admiral Hipper Class No. 3 ship, Prince Eugen. I am the miracle of the Third Reich of Germany, and the Imperial Marshal and Savior of the Holy Roman Empire. To what extent can you please me? I am looking forward to it~
I said, let's call everyone over and have a cocktail party here. Don't peek at other girls when you come.
Hehe, don't worry. The night has just begun♡
How is it? Isn't the view nice? Hehe, I mean the night view of Vienna outside the window?
Ah, have you seen the Prince of Wales? Damn, she's gone again!
You are such a good kid, please keep it up...good things will happen~
(The other party thanks you for not endangering the order of the empire)
Hey, if you dare to ignore the authority of the Empire, you will face the wrath of the Holy Roman Army.
(The other party hates you for endangering the order of the empire)
The Empire has many allies and affiliates. However, you seem to be a unique and valuable target. Come on, accept my invitation, and don't leave until you are drunk tonight~
So that's it for now. What a pity, I haven't had enough fun yet.
It’s not a good idea to jump to conclusions so quickly, or girls will dislike you.
I don't like the type that pursues too much, what do you think?
Now, are you satisfied with this level?
If you're not here to support us, why would I let you go?
Have you heard of Operation Thunderbolt-Hellhound? Don't worry, I'm not going to be sneaky. I think it's better to be open and aboveboard with you.
The Rhine Exercise? Looking back, that's where it all started...
It's not good to bargain with girls, right?
Prince Eugen is pleased with your friendly relationship with the city-state
Prince Eugen hates your attacks on city-states
